医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现昼夜节律紊乱与肥胖和糖尿病有关昼夜节律和时钟基因表达的破坏与不良的代谢健康结果有关，包括肥胖和糖尿病。需要进一步的研究来了解这些关系及其对治疗和预防的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-links-circadian-rhythm-disruption-to-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-links-circadian-rhythm-disruption-to-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72bb74a0-afdb-4acf-a6a5-74b9ebb16a08 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 23:50:00 -0400 Study links circadian rhythm disruption to obesity and diabetes
塔夫茨大学的研究人员发现免疫细胞与阿霉素引起的心脏损伤有关关于阿霉素（一种已有 50 年历史的化疗药物）如何引起最令人担忧的副作用，还有很多东西需要了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Tufts-researchers-uncover-immune-cell-link-to-doxorubicin-induced-heart-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Tufts-researchers-uncover-immune-cell-link-to-doxorubicin-induced-heart-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=158363d9-2ffa-475e-8bf9-18bcb2e313f0 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 23:42:05 -0400 Tufts researchers uncover immune cell link to doxorubicin-induced heart damage
研究发现，长期接触空气污染会使患牛皮癣的风险加倍长期暴露于空气污染和遗传倾向显着增加患牛皮癣的风险，凸显了环境和遗传因素的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Long-term-air-pollution-exposure-doubles-psoriasis-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Long-term-air-pollution-exposure-doubles-psoriasis-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe1aaf6b-2a61-4eb3-ac5e-a20bb82e940b Wed, 17 Jul 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Long-term air pollution exposure doubles psoriasis risk, study finds
新技术有一天可以用于靶向胶质母细胞瘤治疗脑癌很复杂，但突破性的新研究可能有助于为抗癌武器库添加另一种工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/New-technique-could-one-day-be-used-to-target-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/New-technique-could-one-day-be-used-to-target-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4894c6d7-fecd-4107-8001-6f1121cd4119 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 23:29:02 -0400 New technique could one day be used to target glioblastoma
针对老年人的创新型家庭经颅电刺激训练对于美国老年人来说，往返诊所或实验室接受治疗可能既困难又昂贵。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Innovative-home-based-transcranial-electrical-stimulation-training-for-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Innovative-home-based-transcranial-electrical-stimulation-training-for-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec7fbc1a-128c-4d85-8656-b7d1739ed90a Wed, 17 Jul 2024 22:52:03 -0400 Innovative home-based transcranial electrical stimulation training for older adults
美洲驼衍生分子针对隐藏的艾滋病毒株佐治亚州立大学的一个研究小组开发出了微小而有效的分子，能够针对隐藏的艾滋病毒株。来源？来自美洲驼 DNA 的抗体基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Llama-driven-molecules-target-hidden-strains-of-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Llama-driven-molecules-target-hidden-strains-of-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c2ebb2e-4192-4bd4-a754-ab351ab48b3f Wed, 17 Jul 2024 22:36:24 -0400 Llama-derived molecules target hidden strains of HIV
增加住宅绿化的接触可能有助于延缓认知能力下降一项新研究发现，增加住宅绿化的接触可能有助于以每年八个月的速度延缓认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Increased-exposure-to-residential-greenery-may-help-stave-off-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Increased-exposure-to-residential-greenery-may-help-stave-off-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db0b039c-ae2b-443c-a8e4-6257b53b5377 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 22:29:12 -0400 Increased exposure to residential greenery may help stave off cognitive decline
研究发现，耳鸣与男性肥胖和身体成分有关研究发现耳鸣与身体成分之间存在显着联系，特别强调男性肥胖相关炎症的增加是一个潜在因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Tinnitus-linked-to-obesity-and-body-composition-in-men-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Tinnitus-linked-to-obesity-and-body-composition-in-men-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d6f1978-b3b1-4d46-baba-210af6451002 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 22:00:00 -0400 Tinnitus linked to obesity and body composition in men, study finds
每天喝咖啡可降低多囊卵巢综合症风险最近的一项研究表明，每天饮用咖啡可以显着降低出现多囊卵巢综合症症状的风险。每天喝两杯咖啡的女性患 PCOS 的风险降低 70%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Drinking-coffee-daily-linked-to-decreased-PCOS-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Drinking-coffee-daily-linked-to-decreased-PCOS-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a204b468-f95f-4307-b082-d52dc8d0ee91 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 21:22:00 -0400 Drinking coffee daily linked to decreased PCOS risk
研究人员发现一组特殊的“第一反应者”细胞对于触发血糖反应至关重要我们的身体如何如此精确地控制血糖？由德国糖尿病研究中心德累斯顿保罗朗格汉斯研究所 (PLID) 科学家领导的国际研究小组让我们离答案又近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Researchers-find-a-special-group-of-first-responder-cells-crucial-for-triggering-blood-sugar-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Researchers-find-a-special-group-of-first-responder-cells-crucial-for-triggering-blood-sugar-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5db58a9b-3741-4504-a340-d4d0d52d6dbf Wed, 17 Jul 2024 15:31:21 -0400 Researchers find a special group of "first responder" cells crucial for triggering blood sugar response
